title: French households savings rate 2010 to 2017
summary: In general Savings rate has fallen over the Year.
Savings rate is roughly constant from 2010 to 2011, gradually decreasing from 2011 to 2013, roughly constant from 2013 to 2015, and lastly slightly decreasing from 2015 to 2016.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2012 and 2013.
The highest Savings rate, of value 15.8 was reached at Year 2010
The lowest Savings rate, of value 14.0 was reported at Year 2016
